price: The huge blast[34] seized those who did wrong, and they fell dead in their homes,
arabic: وَأَخَذَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ٱلصَّيۡحَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ فِي دِيَٰرِهِمۡ جَٰثِمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
